plot: Tu Desayuno Alegre is a Music and Entertainment show that features the essence of Latin music. All genres from Latin Pop to Reggaeton, Urban Rap and Mexican Music are mixed in this variety show
plot_en: Tu Desayuno Alegre is a Music and Entertainment show that features the essence of Latin music. All genres from Latin Pop to Reggaeton, Urban Rap and Mexican Music are mixed in this variety show
plot_es: Tu Desayuno Alegre is a Music and Entertainment show that features the essence of Latin music. All genres from Latin Pop to Reggaeton, Urban Rap and Mexican Music are mixed in this variety show
title: Tu desayuno alegre
